.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx8_soffset_499d5b:

soffset
=======

An unsigned byte offset added to the base address to get memory address.

*Size:* 1 dword.

*Operands:* :ref:`m0<amdgpu_synid_m0>`, :ref:`uimm20<amdgpu_synid_uimm20>`
